duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage daily activities and services provided by social work staff, students, and volunteers.
Ensure patients and family members are provided with detailed education, consultation, and advice.
Oversee crisis intervention, bereavement, client advocacy, referrals, prevention, education, discharge planning, and psychosocial assessments.
Provide administrative, technical, and clinical management of social work staff.
Develop and maintain standardization of quality programming across all social service programs.
Conduct and document difficult and delicate specialized psycho-social assessments.
Employ advanced practice methods in the development, implementation, and evaluation of treatment plans.
Develop meaningful performance measures to establish the quality, effectiveness, and efficiency of social work service operations.
Monitor, evaluate, and adjust services provided by staff to clients to ensure ethical safe optimum patient care.
Conduct and document difficult and delicate specialized psycho-social assessments.
